title: tuneup utilities 2008
description:
Tuneup utilities 2008-

TuneUp Utilities 2008 can make your Windows operating system faster, more comfortable and more secure with just a few mouse clicks. And all operations performed on the operating system are completely safe, because all changes are monitored by TuneUp Rescue Center and can be undone at any time.

All TuneUp Utilities modules can be accessed through a common interface that includes:


-Increase performance
 TuneUp Drive Defrag

Defragments hard disks, thus speeding up Windows and other programs

-TuneUp StartUp Manager

Controls which programs are executed at Windows startup

-TuneUp System Optimizer

Speeds up the system and Internet, offers tips for system configuration 

 
-TuneUp Registry Defrag

Corrects physical errors in the registry and defragments it

 
-TuneUp Memory Optimizer (through Windows XP)

Monitors and optimizes free memory in the background
 
-Free up disk space
 Unnecessary files and backups

Removes unneeded ballast from your disks 

 
-Windows functions

Deactivates selected Windows functions that take up particularly large amounts of disk space

 
-TuneUp Disk Space Explorer

Provides information about the disk space usage of your system and helps you clean up your disks
 
-Maintain Windows
 TuneUp 1-Click Maintenance

Cleans up your system and defragments your drives at the click of a mouse button

 
-TuneUp Registry Cleaner

Removes invalid entries and references from your system
 
-Solve problems
 TuneUp Disk Doctor

Finds and corrects errors on your drives

 
-TuneUp Repair Wizard

Corrects frequently occurring Windows problems quickly and easily

 
-TuneUp Undelete

Recovers files that have been deleted from the Recycle Bin
 
-Customize Windows
 TuneUp System Control

Lets you control the look and feel of the Windows interface

 
-TuneUp Styler

Here you can change Windows symbols, logon screens, the Welcome screen and the visual style
 
-Additional tools
  

-TuneUp Process Manager

Allows you to manage currently running programs

 
-TuneUp Registry Editor

Helps you to edit and browse the registry

 
-TuneUp Shredder

Deletes files securely, ensuring that they cannot be recovered later

 
-TuneUp System Information

Provides comprehensive information on your computer

 

 -TuneUp Uninstall Manager

Uninstalls programs you don&#039;t need anymore
 


In addition to this, the Start Center also has three general buttons in a dark gray bar to the right at the top of the window. Pressing the first button starts the TuneUp Rescue Center module. The second button starts the TuneUp Update Wizard, which can be used to update TuneUp Utilities 2008 to the latest version over the Internet. The last button provides help and settings that you can use to customize the software package to meet your needs.

This is the best system utilities application ever so seed this. 

read txt- file for install info. 

Enjoy!
